techmunich

techmunich is a group of chat channels for developers, designers, marketers, business people, hobbyists, students, and other professionals involved in technology in the Munich area.

It’s a common space for all to use and enjoy. We talk about the technologies we use, our successes and failures, job opportunities, and the latest cute animal GIFs.

Join Us!

Put your best email address in the box below and our robots will send you an invitation.

Great! An invitation should arrive within a few minutes.
Oh No! Our robots are malfunctioning and cannot send invitations at this time. Please try again later.

techmunich runs on Slack, a simple and easy way for people to stay connected.

If you’d like to participate as an admin or to invite your group to the discussion, just ask one of them how to get involved.
